title: My Client and computer freezes as soon as game starts!!! help me!!
body: So it started yesterday after my computer updated so I reset my whole computer to fix the problem and sure enough it didn't fix it. I have played everyday on this computer without a problem and now 2 secs into the match my computer freezes saying errrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr from I guess either spawning into rift or the words or something. but plz help me

replies.body: Mine just started doing this two days ago

Hey Superman!

Try to download this tool and run it and see if it helps. http://ccm.net/download/download-14957-microsoft-fix-it

If not, try and adjust the visual settings to ''adjust for best performance''.

Let me know if this helps or if you need more help :).

Hey there,

>my computer freezes saying errrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr

Could you elaborate on what you mean by this?
